languages.text: "Даже если Крударах уничтожили люди, как ты говоришь, наверняка вы дали нам отличный повод это сделать".
"Even if Crudarach was destroyed by humans as you claim, I imagine you gave them a perfectly good reason to do so."
languages.original_text: "Даже если Крударах уничтожили люди, как ты говоришь, наверняка вы дали нам отличный повод это сделать".

traits.locale_text: "Even if Crudarach was destroyed by Humans as you claim, I imagine you gave them a perfectly good reason to do so."
"Even if Crudarach was destroyed by Humans as you claim, I imagine you gave them a perfectly good reason to do so."
"Even if Crudarach was destroyed by humans as you claim, I imagine you gave them a perfectly good reason to do so."
"Even if Crudarach was destroyed by humans as you claim, I imagine you gave them a perfectly good reason to do so."
"Even if Crudarach was destroyed by humans as you claim, I imagine you gave them a perfectly good reason to do so."

languages.text: “就算真的像你说的那样，克鲁达拉赫是被人类摧毁的，我敢说也是你们给了他们这么做的充分理由。”
languages.original_text: "Even if Crudarach was destroyed by humans as you claim, I imagine you gave them a perfectly good reason to do so."

traits.locale_text: “就算真的像你说的那样，克鲁达拉赫是被人类摧毁的，我敢说也是你们给了他们这么做的充分理由。”

languages.text: 「ムアランの言うとおりクルダラを破壊したのは人間だったとしても、壊されても仕方ない理由を作ったのはお前かもしれないな」
languages.original_text: "Even if Crudarach was destroyed by humans as you claim, I imagine you gave them a perfectly good reason to do so."

traits.locale_text: 「ムアランの言うとおりクルダラを破壊したのは人間だったとしても、壊されても仕方ない理由を作ったのはお前かもしれないな」

languages.text: "Selbst wenn Crudarach von Menschen zerstört worden wäre, wie Ihr behauptet, nehme ich an, Ihr habt ihnen dazu einen sehr guten Grund gegeben."
languages.original_text: "Even if Crudarach was destroyed by humans as you claim, I imagine you gave them a perfectly good reason to do so."

traits.locale_text: "Selbst wenn Crudarach von Menschen zerstört worden wäre, wie Ihr behauptet, nehme ich an, Ihr habt ihnen dazu einen sehr guten Grund gegeben."

languages.text: « Même si Crudarach a été détruit par des humains comme vous le prétendez, j'imagine que vous leur aviez donné une excellente raison de le faire. »
languages.original_text: "Even if Crudarach was destroyed by humans as you claim, I imagine you gave them a perfectly good reason to do so."

traits.locale_text: « Même si Crudarach a été détruit par des humains comme vous le prétendez, j'imagine que vous leur aviez donné une excellente raison de le faire. »

languages.text: «Incluso aunque los humanos hubieran destruido Crudarach, como dices, me imagino que habrán tenido muy buenos motivos para hacerlo».
languages.original_text: "Even if Crudarach was destroyed by humans as you claim, I imagine you gave them a perfectly good reason to do so."

traits.locale_text: «Incluso aunque los humanos hubieran destruido Crudarach, como dices, me imagino que habrán tenido muy buenos motivos para hacerlo».

languages.text: "Crudarach, iddia ettiğin gibi insanlar tarafından yok edilmiş olsa bile eminim bunun için onlara çok iyi bir sebep vermişsinizdir."
languages.original_text: "Even if Crudarach was destroyed by humans as you claim, I imagine you gave them a perfectly good reason to do so."

traits.locale_text: "Crudarach, iddia ettiğin gibi insanlar tarafından yok edilmiş olsa bile eminim bunun için onlara çok iyi bir sebep vermişsinizdir."
